content.raw:
@T_AL, are you talking about getting the torso cameras?  I noticed during the qual round that there was a topic that published those cameras, but I don't think it's there anymore.  I think all images from /multisense/camera/left/\* and /multisense/camera/right/\* are from the head cameras.  

It would be nice to have those torso cameras, but I'd prefer to have the depth data from the head... With so many cameras stuck in the head, I wonder if it's too massive.  Since the controller just doesn't seem strong enough to keep the head up, perhaps they could simply lower the masses of the meshes in the head and see if that makes it easier on the controller.
content.html:
@T_AL, are you talking about getting the torso cameras? I noticed during the qual round that there was a topic that published those cameras, but I don't think it's there anymore. I think all images from /multisense/camera/left/* and /multisense/camera/right/* are from the head cameras.

It would be nice to have those torso cameras, but I'd prefer to have the depth data from the head... With so many cameras stuck in the head, I wonder if it's too massive. Since the controller just doesn't seem strong enough to keep the head up, perhaps they could simply lower the masses of the meshes in the head and see if that makes it easier on the controller.
